casebody.data:
GUARANTY TRUST COMPANY OF NEW YORK and Mary J. Dillon, Trustees, Plaintiffs-Appellants-Appellees, v. JOHNS-MANVILLE CORPORATION, Defendant-Appellant-Appellee. No. 302. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. April 20, 1936. E. Clarkson Seward, of New York City (Arlon V. Cushman and W. Saxton Seward, both of New York City, of counsel), for plaintiffs. Dean, Fairbank, Hirsch & Foster, of New York City (Clair W. Fairbank and S. A. Demma, both of New York City, of counsel), for defendant.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree (14 F.Supp. 792) affirmed.
